title: Requires the provision of guides containing best practices for retaining employees who are informal caregivers
summary: Allocates an amount equal to one-half the net collections from taxes in Suffolk county to the towns and villages of the county of Suffolk on the basis of the ratio which the full valuation of real property in each town outside the village or village bears to the aggregate full valuation of real property.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to the provision of guides containing best practices for retaining employees who are informal caregivers
